description: Gratifii is ASX-listed technology company that enables businesses to create and drive customer engagement with loyalty and rewards programs. Our core product, Mosaic™, is a customer enterprise engagement platform that is modular, scalable and globally portable.Our services are a complete solution offering affordable market-leading functionality and configurability. enhanced_description: Gratifii, an ASX-listed technology company, offers Mosaic™, a modular, scalable, and globally portable enterprise engagement platform. While its core capabilities extend to customer loyalty and rewards programs, the platform is also specifically designed to significantly improve employee happiness, engagement, and retention through comprehensive loyalty and rewards initiatives, recognition programs, and benefits administration functionalities. Trusted by over 60 top brands across Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, and UAE, Gratifii provides a complete solution for delivering memorable employee experiences and fostering connection and purpose within organizations through state-of-the-art technology and high-impact strategic concepts.
